strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Enjoy Jamendo from the Sidebar. Using this gadget you can find music from jamendo.com and listen to it in your sidebar.
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Jamendo Gadget © 2007 Benjamin Schirmer For help and the latest version visit the Jamendo Gadget homepage: http://www.imagine-interactive.de/jamendogadget/
This gadget lets you explore the great albums on Jamendo. You can search for albums by tag, album or artist.
Visit www.jamendo.com to download your favorite albums.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Icons from the great FamFamFam Silk Icon Suite by Mark James http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/silk/
